title: iPhone X vs Google Pixel 2!
description: How does the Apple iPhone X vs Google Pixel 2 XL stack up? Is the Google Pixel 2 worth it?  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:

I recently did a video on the Pixel 2, and I came away with it thinking that it is one of my favorite phones I've ever tried, but how does it stack up to the iPhone X? The iPhone has my favorite hardware of any phone ever, and the screen is right up there with the best like the Galaxy S8 and the Note 8 which is where the Pixel falls apart. When it comes to spending $850 on a smartphone, a bad screen is a straight up deal breaker for me, which leaves the standard Pixel 2. When you consider that it is $350 cheaper than the iPhone X, I'm willing to put up with the less impressive screen and the giant bezels. It really is a crazy, crazy good phone! If you have the budget, you're not gonna be disappointed with the iPhone X, but for a lot of people, the standard Pixel 2 actually makes a lot of sense. So which one would you guys go for?
